title: north
details:
Bare land in rural area with facing to small lake called " Aluth Wewa " . its only 5km away from newly highway (Matara - Hambanthota) and 7km from Beliatta Railway Station. Peacock , wildborn, rabbit, monkeys, hedgehog, squirrel, birds and manu more animal also here. its very calm area and suitable for
chalets or villas who like quiet and peaceful holiday.
